content: colin the crocodile is the fifth animal in the little zoo animals series and the third one i have done in collaboration with the talented anette bak he works up to 9 5 and is bigger than the other little zoo animals i have supplied both a pdf version of the pattern and a photo tutorial if you have any questions please don t hesitate to contact me **more little zoo animals** you can find all the other little zoo animals here 1 happy hooking dedri 1 http //www ravelry com/bundles/2966
